name: Crunch Time (OwenBenRees)
description:
Fight your way through hoards of office supplies in the sewers.
Your goal is to destroy all of the enemies on the level.

Each level is randomly generated so every play through will have different layout.

Controls:
Movement - WASD or Arrow Keys
Briefcase Attack - Left mouse button
Fire Attack - Right mouse button
Upgrade Abilities - Q
Restart Level - Enter

Twitter @OwenBenRees
